credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Decoration for portrait of Pope Pius VI and royal couple
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Vertical rectangle. In front of a curtain stands a support which has below the shape of a column. Obliquely fastened to it are two ovoidal frames in front of a trophy of colors. A putto is shown kneeling upon either frame raising crowns and mace. Above in the interval between the frames is a bearded head with a helmet. It supports another frame having on top two putti with the keys and the tiara. Colored background.
name: Drawing
